content.rendered:
Video Call

Immersive video call solutions

Take the complexity out of embedding real-time 1:1 and multi-party video solutions with fully customizable and easy to integrate Video APIs.

Featuring Dolby Voice® Technology

Create a custom video solution

HD video

Add HD video calling for a fully immersive experience in up to 30 FPS. HD video is compatible with all mobile devices and browsers, while optimizing bandwidth and conserving battery based on participant network conditions.

Real-time replay

Capture your meetings as they happen and replay them in real-time — or export them as MP3 or MP4 files.

Call recording

Capture audio recordings and video recordings in up to 1080p. Customize the visual orientation of your recordings, including screen sharing, with dynamic layouts.

Learn more

Screen sharing

Capture and screen share from any view in your web or mobile application with APIs that support Android, iOS, Windows, MacOS, and desktop browsers.

Live streaming

Stream via Real-Time Messaging Protocol (RTMP) to a third party live streaming service such as YouTube and Facebook.

Learn more

Interactive streaming – WebRTC

Keep delays low with low-latency WebRTC broadcasting, so you can introduce interactive elements into your webinars, classes, training sessions, and other live events.

Learn more

A/V congruence

Hear what you see. Spatial Audio enables three-dimensional listening experiences that make it easy to identify who is talking in a multi-party video call. If someone on the left side of your screen talks, their voice will come from the left.

Learn more

Messaging

Enrich your Dolby.io voice or video solution with real-time chat messaging using our Messaging API partner, Stream.

Learn more

Demo

Experience Dolby.io Spatial Audio

Experience voice and video calls like never before with Dolby.io Spatial Audio — now enhanced with manual Spatial Placement. The Spatial Placement feature enhancement allows developers to manually place sound objects anywhere within a three-dimensional space to create immersive audio scenes. Build high-fidelity, real-time communications and improve the listening experiences with less fatigue.

Experience the demo

Demo

Experience Dolby.io Spatial Audio in the metaverse

Odyssey, an immersive metaverse platform, chose Dolby.io Spatial Audio to give users in the metaverse freedom to move and talk with a high-fidelity experience — like when meeting together in-person. For the full experience, try the demo on a laptop or desktop computer, use headphones, and grab a few friends to join the room.

Experience the demo

Developer Platform

Developer Resources

Public docs

Learn from our getting started guides, tutorials, how-to articles, and interactive API reference explorer.

Sample projects

Start with one of the open-source sample projects on GitHub to accelerate building your application.

Self-service dashboard

  • Create and manage your application API Keys.
  • Monitor account usage, billing, subscription plans, and invoices.
  • Manage access for your team with an enterprise account and get quick access to support.
Sign up for an account Sign up for an account

Documentation

Take me there

Developer blog

Read now

SECURITY

Secure, reliable, and scalable

We remove the complexity of building a communications solution while ensuring security and compliance, including access to a global infrastructure. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

It’s never just about technology, it’s how you interact with it. With Dolby.io, our telehealth platform provides healthcare customers the ability to communicate with patients… all while delivering millions of crystal-clear call minutes.

Henrik Molin

CEO & Co-Founder, Physitrack

We need solutions like Dolby.io to help us move to the next level. The telehealth solution allows us to become more virtual and support surgeons from any location, so they’re able to provide the best services possible for their patients.

Samuel Ethiopia

Co-Founder & Chief Operating Officer, DocSpera

Dolby.io’s superior call quality with HD video and sound, as well as a robust and scalable solution had the flexibility we were looking for.

Henrik Molin

CEO & Co-Founder, Physitrack

Dolby.io is a very easy-to-use solution, the Communications APIs are easy to use, and the OAuth authentication scheme is familiar to us.

Luca Santarella

Head of Research & Development, DocSpera

Popular Use Cases

The possibilities are endless

Telehealth

Build HIPAA-compliant communications to support ongoing care and wellness.

Collaboration

Build custom collaboration apps to unite your participants with an open source UX kit that accelerates production.

Classrooms

Deploy lifelike virtual classrooms, training sessions, and webinars that keep remote participants engaged.

Live events

Level up your one-to-many communications with experiences that encourage interaction and audience participation.

Recruiting

Converse with applicants as though you’re face-to-face, even if you’re thousands of miles apart.

Online Broadcasting

Deliver crystal-clear audio and video for nearly any web event, from tens to hundreds of participants.

Get started

Start building with audio and video APIs

No credit card to start. Get a $15 credit just for signing up.

Start building for free Start building for free
Contact sales
Our Products

One platform for audio and video

communications

Build crystal clear voice call solutions

communications

communications

media

media

Music Mastering

Create release-ready music with an API call

streaming

Interactive Streaming

Deliver low-latency interactive streaming

streaming

Live Streaming

Deliver high-quality streaming anywhere, anytime

Keep a good thing going

Get the latest news, events, and product updates from the Dolby.io team.
